primary_phone.purpose: Confirm Phase-1 appeal mailing addresses and issuing authority routing.

sections.authority_name: City of Houston ParkHouston (Parking Management Division)

serves.description: Most City of Houston parking citations are issued and processed through ParkHouston, the city's Parking Management Division.

visual_markers: HX, P or V prefix near the citation number
how_to_recognize.notes: City citations often begin with prefixes HX, P or V as indicated on the ParkHouston payment site; numbers follow the prefix【222206061973774†L252-L257】.

submission_methods.notes: You may contest your citation online within seven days via the HoustonParking T2 portal or in person at the Parking Adjudication Office within 30 days; the city does not provide a mailing address for initial hearings【222206061973774†L252-L272】.

appeal_mail_to.missing_reason: ParkHouston allows online or in-person hearings; a mailing address for Phase‑1 appeals is not published and must be confirmed.

confirm_by_phone.purpose: Confirm that there is no mailing address for ParkHouston Phase‑1 appeals and verify contest procedures.

verification.verified_source_note: ParkHouston’s resolve a citation page provides contest timelines and contact details but does not list a mailing address【222206061973774†L252-L272】.

serves.description: Parking citations that explicitly list the Houston Police Department as the issuing authority.

how_to_recognize.notes: HPD-issued citations may include the department name and an officer’s badge or citation number; format is not formally published.

submission_methods.notes: HPD citations route to ParkHouston for contesting; HPD does not process appeals directly.

confirm_by_phone.purpose: Confirm routing for HPD-issued parking citations and verify that appeals are handled by ParkHouston.

verification.verified_source_note: Assumed routing to ParkHouston; must confirm with ParkHouston customer service.

sections.canonical_section_name: University of Houston Parking & Transportation Services

serves.description: Citations issued for parking violations on the University of Houston campuses.

how_to_recognize.notes: UH citations contain numeric citation numbers; appeals must be submitted through the myParking portal within 10 days【617789092808993†L176-L186】.

submission_methods.notes: Appeals can only be filed online via the myParking account; they cannot be submitted by mail or by phone【617789092808993†L176-L186】.

appeal_mail_to.missing_reason: The University of Houston requires all appeals to be submitted online; no mailing address for appeals is published【617789092808993†L176-L186】.

confirm_by_phone.purpose: Confirm that there is no mailing address for UH parking citation appeals.

verification.verified_source_note: UH appeals page states that appeals can only be done online and not by mail or phone【617789092808993†L176-L186】.

sections.canonical_section_name: Rice University Police Department Parking Enforcement

serves.description: Parking citations issued on Rice University campus for students, faculty, staff, visitors and outside-unregistered visitors.

how_to_recognize.notes: Rice citations use numeric identifiers; appeals require a $10 deposit for visitors and are processed through an online portal【341288102620812†L118-L125】.

submission_methods.notes: Appeals must be submitted through the online portal. A $10 appeal deposit is required; the deposit can be mailed or paid in person to the Rice University Police Department【341288102620812†L118-L125】.

confirm_by_phone.purpose: Confirm the mailing address for sending the appeal deposit.

verification.verified_source_note: Rice University parking enforcement page lists the address for mailing appeal deposits and details of the appeal process【341288102620812†L118-L125】.

serves.description: Parking and traffic citations issued on Houston Christian University property.

how_to_recognize.notes: HCU citations are numeric; appeals must be filed by completing a written form obtained from the University Police Department within 10 working days【631378729922510†L293-L305】.

submission_methods.notes: Appeal forms must be obtained and submitted at the HCU Police Department; no online or mail submissions are offered【631378729922510†L293-L305】.

appeal_mail_to.missing_reason: Appeal procedures require an in-person written form at the University Police Department; the university does not publish a mailing address for appeals【631378729922510†L293-L305】.

confirm_by_phone.purpose: Confirm whether appeals may be mailed and obtain mailing address if applicable.

verification.verified_source_note: HCU traffic and parking page describes appeal procedures but does not list a mailing address【631378729922510†L293-L305】.

sections.canonical_section_name: University of Houston-Downtown Parking & Transportation Services

serves.description: Parking violations issued on University of Houston-Downtown property.

how_to_recognize.notes: UHD citations are numeric; appeals must be filed online via Manage My Account or in person within 10 days【776620137317759†L226-L233】.

submission_methods.notes: You can appeal a citation within 10 days online through the Manage My Account portal or in person at the Parking & Transportation Services office; mail appeals are not described【776620137317759†L226-L233】.

appeal_mail_to.missing_reason: UHD handles appeals online or in person; a mailing address for Phase‑1 appeals is not provided【776620137317759†L226-L233】.

confirm_by_phone.purpose: Confirm that there is no mailing address for UHD citation appeals.

verification.verified_source_note: UHD resolution of citation page explains that appeals are made online or in person and does not provide a mailing address【776620137317759†L226-L233】.

sections.canonical_section_name: University of Houston-Clear Lake Parking & Transportation

serves.description: Parking violations issued on University of Houston-Clear Lake property.

how_to_recognize.notes: UHCL citation numbers are numeric; appeals must be submitted through the online Parking Portal within 14 days【229409297006850†L239-L245】.

submission_methods.notes: Appeals must be submitted and received within 14 days through the UHCL Parking Portal; other methods are not accepted【229409297006850†L239-L245】.

appeal_mail_to.missing_reason: UHCL directs all appeals through its parking portal and does not publish a mailing address for Phase‑1 appeals【229409297006850†L239-L245】.

confirm_by_phone.purpose: Confirm absence of a mailing address for appeals.

verification.verified_source_note: UHCL citations and appeals page states appeals must be submitted through the parking portal within 14 days and provides contact information【229409297006850†L239-L245】.

blocking_issues: ParkHouston does not publish a mailing address for Phase‑1 appeals; confirmation by phone is required.
known_gaps: Houston Police Department routing to ParkHouston needs confirmation.
University of Houston, Houston Christian University, University of Houston-Downtown and UH-Clear Lake sections missing confirmed mailing addresses for appeals.
